product_name: Hi-Tec Raider Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Rain and mud won't spoil your day on the trail with the Hi-Tec Raider Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots. The waterproof synthetic suede uppers will keep your feet dry all day long. Lightweight and durable high-performance shank ensures the right degree of flexibility and stability during wear. Carbon rubber outsole provides reliable traction; abrasion-resistant toe bumper adds extra protection. Ghillie and double-eyelet lacing system creates a secure fit. Thermoplastic rubber heel arm ensures a secure heel lock, even during the most arduous trails. Ortholite insole delivers long-lasting cushioning, anti-odor and antimicrobial properties. Includes an additional layer of underfoot cushioning sandwiched between the footbed and midsole to improve comfort. Hi-Tec Raider Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots have moisture-wicking linings to keep feet dry. Closeout.
short_description: Rain and mud won't spoil your day on the trail with the Hi-Tec Raider Mid Waterproof Hiking Boots. The waterproof synthetic suede uppers will keep your feet dry all day long.
